src:
Dijaga Satpol PP, Sekitar Bundaran HI Bebas dari PKL
03 Nov 2019, 08:26 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Pemprov DKI Jakarta kembali mengingatkan soal titik-titik di mana PKL boleh berjualan di area CFD. Kawasan Bundaran HI terlihat steril dari PKL dengan penjagaan dari Satpol PP.
Pantauan detikcom, di kawasan Bundaran HI, Jalan MH Thamrib, Jakarta Pusat, Minggu (3/11/2019), pada pukul 07.45 Wib, tidak nampak lagi adanya PKL yang berjualan. Warga nampak leluasa melakukan aktivitasnya seperti berjalan, berlari, dan bersepeda.


Foto: Sekitar Bundaran HI bersih dari PKL (Rolando/detikcom)

Seorang warga, Moslem (31) menyambut baik bersihnya kawasan Bundaraan HI dari PKL saat CFD. Namun, dia merasa masih ada yang kurang dari kebijakan tidak adanya PKL di kawasan Bundaran HI.
"Bagus sih sebenernya, jadinya kalau mau yang mau olahraga, olahraga, kekurangannya masing-masing giat itu misalkan kayak lari ada running tracknya sendiri," kata Moslem.
"Terus misalnya sepedaan, ada cylingnnya sendiri. Pedagang seperti sekarangkan dikasih tempatnya kan, saya rasa sih lebih bagus begitu. Masih banyak sih kekurangannya," sambungnya sambil menggendong anak.
text:
Guarded by Satpol PP, Around the HI Roundabout are Free of Street Vendors
03 Nov 2019, 08:26 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - The Provincial Government of DKI Jakarta again reminds about the points where street vendors may sell in the CFD area. The HI Roundabout area looks sterile from street vendors with the guard of Satpol PP.
AFP monitoring, in the Bundaran HI area, Jalan MH Thamrib, Central Jakarta, Sunday (3/11/2019), at 07.45 West Indonesia Time, no more street vendors were seen selling. Residents appear to be free to carry out activities such as walking, running and cycling.


Photo: Around the HI Roundabout clean of street vendors (Rolando / detikcom)

One resident, Moslem (31) welcomed the cleanliness of the HI Bundaraan area from street vendors during CFD. However, he felt there was still something missing from the absence of street vendors in the HI Roundabout area.
"It's really good, actually, if you want sports, sports, the disadvantages of each are to be active, for example like running, there is its own running track," Moslem said.
"Then for example a bicycle, there is cylingn itself. Traders like now given the place right, I think it's better that way. There are still many drawbacks," he continued, holding a child.
